name: OH NO! (ErichthoniusGames)
description: This game is for the brackeys 2021.2 game jam, it was made in one and a half days by me, a 17 year old dev whos been making games for a while. Its a retro themed top down game that gets very chaotic, very quick. This is my first time ever making a game of this type, so any feedback would be really appreciated! If you want to support more of my projects follow @erichthonigames on twitter or @erichthoinusgames Instagram ;)
